successes.title: Battle Systems™ Fantasy Dungeon Terrain
successes.description: Fantasy Dungeon terrain for 28mm tabletop games. This is pre-punched card that is easy to assemble with no painting required.

Pledges.description: Yes it's the reward of our THANKS. We cannot stress our gratitude enough. You are helping us develop a new way to play games, inside of awesome buildings and structures. We thank you from the bottom of our hearts.

Approx $121 USD. DUNGEON EARLY BIRD (Includes all FREE stretch goals) 1 Game Mat (2'x'2) * 30 Walls * 12 Doorway walls + 12 Doors * 6 Barrels * 4 Tombs * 4 Treasure Chests * 4 Tables * 2 Bookcases * 2 Thrones * 18 Walkways & Bridges (various shapes) * 45 Balustrades (various shapes) * 6 Stairs (small and large) * 15 pairs of Wall Converters * 12 Torches * 27 Struts (assorted sizes) * 34 additional ramps * 70+ Acrylic clips * PLUS THESE KS BONUSES * 1 Iron Furnace * 1 Stone Well * 2 Counterforts * PLUS all stretch goals marked as FREE! - UK Shipping is included - Rest of World add £10. AUSTRALIAN & NEW ZEALAND BACKERS ADD £18 TO YOUR PLEDGE.

Approx $124 USD. AUSTRALIAN & NEW ZEALAND BACKERS ADD £18 TO YOUR PLEDGE.
